root.name: Urban Brawl
root.description: Overview Urban Brawl (also known as Action Doom 2: Urban Brawl) is an indie first-person beat-em-up and shooter using a modified id Tech 1 engine (known as ZDoom). The game was released in two forms: a freeware download and a boxed CD (sold for $9.99 directly from the website, which includes bonus content). As of May 20, 2010, the boxed CD is no longer sold and the bonus content can be accessed from the main website. The game features a distinct comic-book style, with the story told in noir-style cutscenes reminiscent to Sin City. The story, in which the protagonist is trying to rescue his daughter by a group of thugs, can be branched in multiple paths according to the player's actions. The game features multiple endings, both good and bad. The game also features plenty of secret items and weapons, such as chainsaws and sub-machine guns. The game can be found here.
